item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: College Football Model
item.description: .tag { display: inline-block; padding: 2px 12px; border-radius: 15px; font-weight: 600; font-size: 12px; } .good { background: hsl(116, 60%, 90%); color: hsl(116, 30%, 25%); } .bad { background: hsl(350, 70%, 90%); color: hsl(350, 45%, 30%); } .main-container { max-width: 1500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } Team Rankings {"x":{"tag":{"name":"Reactable","attribs":{"data":{"all_rank":[63,121,4,20,112,97,67,82,32,41,72,100,24,60,126,25,1,116,19,71,2,10,9,40,81,87,113,105,11,28,120,107,52,30,45,68,102,61,51,99,13,43,31,125,59,39,73,18,17,123,57,91,80,8,56,49,21,77,79,96,101,86,83,78,95,50,65,35,115,29,109,89,12,6,70,3,27,26,75,7,103,92,62,48,85,98,38,14,37,84,93,110,118,111,108,66,114,94,33,16,106,88,69,58,55,36,53,34,76,124,117,22,119,104,54,122,64,47,44,15,42,90,23,46,5,74],"school":["Air Force","Akron","Alabama","Appalachian State","Arizona","Arizona State","Arkansas","Arkansas State","Army","Auburn","Ball State","Baylor","Boise State","Boston College","Bowling Green","Buffalo","BYU","California","Central Michigan","Charlotte","Cincinnati","Clemson","Coastal Carolina","Colorado","Colorado State","Duke","East Carolina","Eastern Michigan"
